p: A comparison of the relative quantity of virus in the three species of whitefly fed on CLCuMuV and CLCuMuB-infected cotton plants for a 6, 12, 24 and 48 h AAP was conducted. The results showed that all three species ingested both CLCuMuV and CLCuMuB. The relative quantity of CLCuMuV ( Fig. 2) and CLCuMuB ( Fig. 3) in the whiteflies increased significantly in each treatment i.e., 6 h, 12 h and 24 h of AAP ( F = 1.45, P = 0.3061; F = 4.96, P = 0.0536; F = 0.77, P = 0.5050); however, the virus quantity after 48 h AAP in Asia II 7 was much higher than that in MEAM1 and MED ( F = 4.09, P = 0.0212).
